short_summary: RCMP to procure services for repaving parking lot at RCMP Emergency Management British Columbia.
description: The RCMP intends to retain a contractor to provide construction services that includes mill and overlay, stomp and grubbing, removal of existing pavers, new sidewalk construction, existing median removal and grading and drainage work at back parking lot. The work is located at the RCMP Emergency Management British Columbia (EMBC) Lease Parking Lot at 14292 Green Timbers Way, Surrey B.C. Canada

===============

**Public Tenders for RCMP EMBC Parking Lot Repaving**

### Tenders for Construction Services

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites tenders from qualified contractors to provide construction services for the repaving of the Emergency Management British Columbia (EMBC) parking lot at 14292 Green Timbers Way, Surrey, British Columbia, Canada. This project involves the preparation and overlay, stomp and grubbing, removal of existing pavers, construction of a new sidewalk, and grading and drainage work.

**Bid Requirements**

*   The selection process is a two-phase procedure.
*   Phase one will cover only the qualifications and experience of the contractor.
*   Phase two will cover pricing.
*   A combined score from both phases will determine the successful contractor.

**Submission Requirements**

*   The Phase One submission must be an electronic bid in PDF format submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit at <E\_Pacific\_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca>.
*   The Phase Two submission will also be in PDF format, and must include a bid for pricing.

**Timeline**

*   The estimated duration for completion is November 1, 2022 to March 31, 2023.
*   The contract duration is also November 1, 2022 to March 31, 2023.
*   Deliveries must be completed within the specified time frame.

### Tender Documents

The tender documents are available for download from [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/06/93ae61ad8c733cfe69a423ed28c8b0e4/202302277\_eng\_rcmp\_embc\_parking\_lot\_repaving.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/06/93ae61ad8c733cfe69a423ed28c8b0e4/202302277_eng_rcmp_embc_parking_lot_repaving.pdf)
